speaker: player
text:
Hello! Thanks for trying out the current version of The Good Fight of Faith!

First, let's have a chat! Press [Enter] to continue this conversation, and then use the [Up] and [Down] arrows to choose a dialog option.

choice.choiceText: What can I do in the game right now?
What's new in the latest update?

speaker: player
text: Oh, where are my manners? My name is Adam! I'm a good friend of Brother Ray, the developer of this game. He thought it would be fun to put me in the game as the main character, so... here I am!

speaker: player
text: 'The Good Fight of Faith' is a Christian, Bible-based computer game that helps the player learn the contents of the holy scriptures, the fundamental principles of Christianity, and the spiritual realities of the Christian life.

speaker: player
text: You take the role of a new believer (that's me!), guiding him through an allegorical world to learn the books of the Bible, evangelize the lost, and conquer spiritual strongholds, en route to a final showdown with Satan, the tempter of man and accuser of the brethren.

speaker: player
text:
Great question!

At this point, you can explore the Land of Allegoria to look for treasure chests, which may contain a book of the Bible, or even one of the 10 commandments. The commandments will lighten my path so I can see farther, while the books will strengthen me for battle!

speaker: player
text: Speaking of battle... As we journey, I will certainly meet enemies who will challenge me, seeking to destroy my precious faith! You'll have to defeat them in a 'scripture battle' by guessing the correct references. The closer your guess, the stronger my attacks will be! Resist the devil, and he will flee from you...

speaker: player
text: As you collect books of the Bible, open the Books subscreen to enable them. The verses you get in a scripture battle will always come from your current selection of books. Using more books will make guessing the references harder, but it will also multiply the strength of your attacks; so as you continue reading and studying the Bible on your own, you will get better at the game.

speaker: player
text: Should you suffer a defeat, don't despair! The Lord is gracious and able to keep you from falling! But you will need to visit some brethren at a church so they can help to restore your faith. Only by faith can we have victory in Christ to overcome the world.

speaker: player
text: As you approach towns, you will also encounter some people. Now is a good time to introduce yourself and meet them! Someday, you will also be able to preach to them, and by God's grace, even help to turn their hearts to the Lord.

speaker: player
text:
ADVENTURE CONTROLS:
Hold down [Arrow] keys to walk. You can hold two directions (e.g. 'up' + 'right') to walk diagonally.
Hold [Shift] key at the same time to run instead.
Hold down [N] to view name tags for all characters. (Names will only be shown if you have met them already.)
Press [P] to pause/unpause
Press [Space] to talk to another person (if they are in front of me)

speaker: player
text:
BATTLE CONTROLS:
To guess the book, use [Up/Down] arrows to change the selection, and then press [Enter].
To guess the chapter or verse, type in a number and press [Enter].
(You can use [Backspace] or [Delete] if you make a mistake.)
After taking your turn, a score summary is shown based on your guess. Press [Enter] to continue, and your adversary will take his turn, too!

speaker: player
text:
OTHER CONTROLS:
You can click the icons on the interface panel to open subscreens, or press the associated key. (Most of them are still empty, but you can access the Books, Map, and Exit function.
If you forget some of the controls, you can press [H] in Adventure Mode to display this intro conversation again.
You can also turn on a 'debug mode' by going to the Options subscreen and pressing [D] there. In debug mode, your vision is maxed out and the entire world map is visible.

speaker: player
text:
FEBRUARY 2025 UPDATE

It's a smaller update this month, but here are the new changes:
- completed roads within towns
- added church buildings (just a simple object; the setup isn't finalized, but now you can at least see them and restore your faith by visiting them)
- created this intro conversation to replace the static help text
